channel.title: Favorite events
channel.description: hey guys just wondering what are your favorite events for a RSPS? ;)

item.title: Favorite events
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:12, topic:465206”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=570028.msg4138193#msg4138193 date=1351890523]
No event has really been fun from servers to me personally because of how poorly they’re done and how stupid the dialog is.
P:“Hi santa!”
N:“I’m high as fuck, get me this shit and youll get a santa hat!”
P:“Cool shit man!”
N:“Now go the fuck away, I gota use this dildo”

It’s fucking dumb. and the Items you end up having to bring are typically something that has no relevance to the holiday, like bringing santa 2 rune bars and a feather.

And yes, I did see both of those in a Christmas event from a server.
[/quote]
Those servers are usually run by 11 year olds though, the ones that giggle with every instance of the word “dildo”. I’ve seen some better events, only that have been released in code snippets and stuff though.[/quote]
Yeah I know, but I see this kind of dialog in 50% of servers though. It’s kind of sad, I don’t care if they swear, I swear more than the average person, but they at least need to have some kind of personality. I’m getting offtopic, whatever, I’ll save it for when someone makes a thread about it.

Read full topic

P:“Hi santa!”
N:“I’m high as fuck, get me this shit and youll get a santa hat!”

It’s fucking dumb. and the Items you end up having to bring are typically something that has no relevance to the holiday, like bringing santa 2 rune bars and a feather.

And yes, I did see both of those in a Christmas event from a server.[/quote]
Those servers are usually run by 11 year olds though, the ones that giggle with every instance of the word “dildo”. I’ve seen some better events, only that have been released in code snippets and stuff though.

item.title: Favorite events
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

No event has really been fun from servers to me personally because of how poorly they’re done and how stupid the dialog is.
P:“Hi santa!”
N:“I’m high as fuck, get me this shit and youll get a santa hat!”
P:“Cool shit man!”
N:“Now go the fuck away, I gota use this dildo”

It’s fucking dumb. and the Items you end up having to bring are typically something that has no relevance to the holiday, like bringing santa 2 rune bars and a feather.

And yes, I did see both of those in a Christmas event from a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite events
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

Fails:

No event in any RSPS has grabbed my attention. They are all the same, or the ones I have played are. So, I have no favorite event regarding Private Servers. However, the Halloween event in RuneScape back in 2008 (I think) where you received a skeleton costume was my favorite.

I wasn’t really around for some of the farther back events but yeah this would have to be one of my favorite, either this or the christmas one around 08 or 09 whenever that was… (got kind of aggravating but it was ok)

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite events
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:7, topic:465206”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=570028.msg4133329#msg4133329 date=1351401392]
nothing is limited when it comes to proper developing.
[/quote]

^this

@Tutorial you mean most events are made by kids who have limited knowledge and can only make dialogue/make you teleport, etc.[/quote]
Yes, but I’m not going to single anyone out, because I’ve yet to play an event that I really enjoyed.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite events
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Fails:

No event in any RSPS has grabbed my attention. They are all the same, or the ones I have played are. So, I have no favorite event regarding Private Servers. However, the Halloween event in RuneScape back in 2008 (I think) where you received a skeleton costume was my favorite.

The main reason RSPS events aren’t interesting is due to the same map and limited reasoning of the event. Simple, 5-10 minute events may have taken an hour or so to make, but they are usually pointless and very dull.

Read full topic
